typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Loginemail as string,
		Identifier as string,
		Firstname as string,
		Lastname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> tempCSV
source(output(
		Loginemail as string,
		Identifier as string,
		Firstname as string,
		Lastname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	fileSystem: 'import',
	fileName: 'part-00000-945da4db-0e17-4b42-a0c7-24563bdcec51-c000.snappy.parquet') ~> importfile
Vorhanden1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> Zeileandern1
tempCSV derive(fingerprint = sha1(Loginemail,Identifier,Firstname,Lastname)) ~> fingerprinttemp
importfile derive(fingerprint = sha1(Loginemail,Identifier,Firstname,Lastname)) ~> fingerprintimport
fingerprinttemp, fingerprintimport exists(fingerprinttemp@fingerprint == fingerprintimport@fingerprint,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Vorhanden1
Zeileandern1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'import',
	folderPath: 'csv',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Identifier'],
	umask: 0722,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
